title: Drawing, Decorative Studies after the Barberini Collection
title_raw: Decorative Studies after the Barberini Collection
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: 84, monumento antico Barberini Roma. Inscribed twice:  mon antico Barberini Roma. Inscribed under the logia: Logia di Rafaello, Giulio II.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Three friezes from the Barberini Collection: eagle with gharland and masks, putto with gharland, tritone with naiade and Venus; Loggia.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Decorative Studies after the Barberini Collection. Pen and brown ink, brush and sepia wash over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-2726
